name: Bad Ice Cream Cup Fights
description:
soft-serve ice cream and hungry foes are in the icy battlefield, go on war with them. Refuse to be eaten by bad ice cream and act like rouge dessert. Use easy swipe controls and guide your ice cream through mazes.
To advance on the next stage, you have to eat all fruits. Avoid getting caught and eat all fruits.
Enjoy your tasty tough treat with simple and easy controls.
